question: my friends father has a swollen rock hard stomach, cellulitis, cold sweats, hot and cold flashes, fever, nausea, swollen legs, sores, and hes getting irritable, he has also developed diabetes while having these symptoms. He has been in and out of the hospital and noone can find out what exactly is wrong with him. My friend is really scared that she will lose her father and i was wondering if anyone would know what it could possibly be...
title: mystery disease
